column4: hi, there. i've got a message from "apt-get install foobar"  -- "Origin Signature check failed.. This deb might not be signed."-- how can i resolve this error?
you don't. the packager has probably not signed his pkg
can you get the program in source form?
i use only "archive.ubuntu.com" repository. and some day ago "apt-get" wrote message  --debsig: Origin Signature check failed. This deb might not be signed.--
